title: Ghost Ship Deck Adventure #51
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Main Deck
rooms.description: A fog-shrouded deck of an ancient ghost ship. Tattered sails hang from broken masts, and ghostly mist swirls around your feet. The wooden planks creak ominously beneath you. Spectral lights flicker in the distance. A ship's wheel stands at the helm, and various nautical equipment lies scattered about.

items.name: ship's wheel
items.description: An old wooden ship's wheel covered in barnacles and seaweed
items.text: Carved into the wheel's hub: 'Captain Graves commands this vessel. First Mate Bones keeps the log. Quartermaster Skull guards the stores.'

items.name: coiled rope
items.description: A thick rope coiled near the mast

items.name: rusty iron key
items.description: A corroded key that might open something below deck

items.name: wooden supply crate
items.description: A weathered crate with the ship's emblem burned into the wood

items.name: old navigation chart
items.description: A sea chart with various markings and notes
items.text: Chart notation: 'The Phantom Maiden set sail in the year 1692. Captain Graves keeps his secrets locked away. The combination to his private stores matches our maiden voyage year.'

items.name: brass cabin key
items.description: A polished brass key with an ornate skull design

items.name: cargo hold hatch
items.description: A heavy wooden hatch leading down to the cargo hold. It's secured with an iron lock.

items.name: captain's cabin door
items.description: An ornate door leading to the captain's private quarters

rooms.name: Captain's Cabin
rooms.description: The captain's private quarters, filled with nautical instruments, maps, and personal effects. A large desk dominates the room, and ghostly portraits of crew members hang on the walls. The air is thick with the smell of salt and old wood. Moonlight filters through a cracked porthole.

items.name: portrait of Captain Graves
items.description: A painting of a stern-looking captain with a long beard
items.text: Captain Elias Graves - Master of the Phantom Maiden. Known for his iron will and command of the seven seas.

items.name: portrait of First Mate Bones
items.description: A painting of a weathered sailor with a scarred face
items.text: First Mate William Bones - Keeper of the ship's log and records. Lost his family to the depths of the ocean.

items.name: portrait of Quartermaster Skull
items.description: A painting of a burly man with a bald head
items.text: Quartermaster Thomas Skull - Guardian of supplies and provisions. Manages the cargo hold stores.

items.name: captain's desk
items.description: A heavy oak desk covered with charts, a compass, and writing materials

items.name: captain's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with the captain's personal entries
items.text: Final Entry: We are cursed! The crew has become spirits bound to this vessel. To escape, one must reach the cargo hold and find the lifeboat. But the hold is protected by questions only the living can answer.

items.name: locked sea chest
items.description: A sturdy chest with brass fittings and a complex lock

items.name: silver hold key
items.description: A silver key that looks important for accessing the lower decks

items.name: brass telescope
items.description: A telescope mounted near the porthole
items.text: Looking through the telescope, you see a distant shore. A note is attached: 'The ocean depths claimed Bones' family. Remember who you are - you are the living, not the dead.'

rooms.name: Cargo Hold
rooms.description: The dark belly of the ship, filled with barrels, crates, and supplies. Water sloshes at the bottom of the hold, and rats scurry in the shadows. A ghostly barrier blocks the way to the lifeboat at the far end. A spectral guardian stands before a sealed door, asking questions of those who wish to pass.

items.name: stack of barrels
items.description: Old barrels containing various ship supplies

items.name: ship's manifest
items.description: A document listing the ship's cargo and crew
items.text: Manifest: The Phantom Maiden carries cargo for the living world. Quartermaster Skull oversees all stores in the cargo hold.

items.name: spectral barrier door
items.description: A shimmering barrier of ghostly energy. The spectral guardian demands answers to three questions before allowing passage.

password_questions.question: Who commands this vessel?
password_questions.hint: Check the ship's wheel and the portraits in the captain's cabin

password_questions.question: What claimed First Mate Bones' family?
password_questions.hint: Read the portraits and the telescope note carefully

password_questions.question: Who are you?
password_questions.hint: The captain's journal and telescope note mention this

rooms.name: Lifeboat Deck
rooms.description: You've reached the lifeboat! A small but sturdy boat hangs from davits, ready to be lowered into the water. The ghostly mist begins to clear, and you can see the shore in the distance. The curse cannot hold you here any longer.

items.name: wooden lifeboat
items.description: A seaworthy lifeboat that can carry you to safety and freedom

items.name: pair of oars
items.description: Sturdy oars for rowing to shore

rooms.win_message: You lower the lifeboat into the water and row away from the cursed ghost ship! The Phantom Maiden fades into the mist behind you as you reach the safety of the shore. The spirits of Captain Graves and his crew watch silently as you escape their eternal fate. You are free! You win!
